Hamzeloofard, S. (2020, January 31). New wave of PlugX targets Hong Kong | Avira Blog. Retrieved April 13, 2021.

description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has stored collected credential files in c:\windows\temp prior to exfiltration. [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also stored documents for exfiltration in a hidden folder on USB drives.(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE PRESIDENT December 2019)(Citation: Avira Mustang Panda January 2020)
